titles.title: Hallelujah! Christ Is Victor (easy familiar ni

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hallelujah! Christ is Victor Tell wher'er you go That the Lord Is still the Conqu'ror Over every foe{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hallelujah! Christ is Victor Tell with every breath That the Saviour still is conqu'or Over sin and death{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hallelujah! Christ is Victor Pain and sickness flee, When we plead the mighty victory Won on Calvary.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hallelujah! Christ is Victor Therefore do and dare Go wherever Jesus sends you In prevailing prayer{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hallelujah! Christ is Victor No defeat nor fear Evermore must dim thy vision Christ the way will clear{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hallelujah! Christ is Victor Soon His voice shall ring "Come ye conqu'rors Come up hither Join thy conquering King."{/lang-eng}
